description: bust portrait of young woman wearing a blue kimono and black obi with yellow flowers, holding a striped fan
marks: [昭和己巳秋日] {Shōwa tsuchinotomi shūjitsu} (autumn day [辰重繪] {Tatsushige e} (painting by Toyonari)
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper with embossing
title: Movie Actress Kurishima Sumiko
